text: is that a van ran over people at the on
London Bridge that three men potentially
came out of the van that they then
headed towards the borough market area
now for people who don't know London
that's a food market very popular with
tourists lots of different stalls and
also lots of bars that have grown up
over the years around that market and
and one eyewitness I've spoken to I
think has given a pretty clear
description of what he saw he is
interesting because he is a security
guard who Oh manages security at a
number of different pubs and bars in
that borough market area and he told me
this he said that he had a call from a
colleague at another bar who said that
people had been stabbed in that bar at a
bar in the Borough Market he then went
over to try and see what was going on he
describes people then running away
screaming he carried on thinking that
there was a fight going on or something
and says he saw three men one with a red
and black top and he gave me another
description now this will be slightly
alarming so don't be alarmed this is
what he said
and it doesn't mean that it is anything
in particular but he said he saw a man
who had canisters that taped to his
abdomen that's one eyewitness he may be
in shock he may not know what he's
looking at but that is what he described
to me he said this man had a long knife
and was attacking people as he saw it
happening he said he saw one one woman
in her early 20s be stabbed and go to
the ground
he said he then went back to his bar to
try to work out what to do and then back
to the scene with a number of security
guards he said the men were still there
he gave a number of pubs that they were
going in and out of he said that he and
his colleagues tried to throw chairs at
these men to stop them doing what they
were doing and then he said he decided
to evacuate the area to leave the area
which he then did he was deeply shocked
when he spoke to me I don't doubt that
he saw something very distressing it is
an eyewitness account and we also have a
woman who described seeing the van hit
pedestrians near a bus stop she says she
saw six people injured there another
eyewitness says he saw three guys three
men we have that to report of something
at Vauxhall and
we have a witness saying that they saw
walking wounded being taken to Liverpool
streets covered in blood and bandages so
to sum that up some sort of a an attack
on this part of South South London very
popular at this time of the night on a
on a night like this some sort of attack
using a van and then as we said three to
four people
eyewitnesses say attacking people in the
Borough Market area
